alert.note: Alert for Kootenai, Cabinet Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 01 at 2:15PM MDT until November 02 at 11:00AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 11 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Accumulating snow expected. Highest accumulations of 2 to 4 inches are expected along the Highway 93 corridor and Highway 2 west to Marion. 1 to 2 inches of snow expected elsewhere. Isolated areas of freezing rain are expected before the precipitation changes to all snow. A light glaze of ice is possible. * WHERE...Highway 2 Kalispell to Libby, Highway 37 Eureka to Libby, Highway 56 Bull Lake Road, and Highway 93 Eureka to Whitefish. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 11 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility during periods of heavy snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
